alert.note: Alert for Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 17 at 5:45PM EDT until July 18 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Falls Village. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flood stage. The park above Falls Village Dam begins to flood, and water reaches the fields of White Hollow Farms near Limerock Road, and is at the edge of the Housatonic Valley Regional High School fields. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM EDT Monday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.1 feet on 12/15/1983. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 5 pm: 7.1 Forecast: Mon 8 pm 7.1 Tue 2 am 7.0 Tue 8 am 6.9 Tue 2 pm 6.8 Tue 8 pm 6.8 Wed 2 am 6.8 Wed 8 am 6.8 Wed 2 pm 6.8 Wed 8 pm 6.7 Thu 2 am 6.6 Thu 8 am 6.5 Thu 2 pm 6.4 &&
